name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ridan AI: Reduce Screen-time with 100% guarantee

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Put   an   inspiring   quote   on   your entire news feed  to   eliminate   social   media noise

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Addicted to consuming content content mindlessly?

Block 
Shorts from YouTube, 
Reels from Instagram, 
News Feed, 
and all such distracting elements that keep us all hooked.



Do you keep extending your daily app limits as soon as it gets over?

Set session limits instead.
w/ a 5 minute buffer
Break your doom scrolling pattern softly, inconsistently, but frequently.



Want these superpowers for your laptop/ PC?

You are carrying time bombs with you while you work. That's why distractions are just one scroll away, while focus and productivity seem light years away. We'll cut the red wires of those time bombs so you can work in FLOW.
Our job at Ridan is to help you 
Resist 
Interesting yet 
Damaging 
Act or 
Notion’s 
by building these tools like IN-N-OUT and Ultra, so that you can have this superpower inside yourself.

However, if you want to get paid while building this great screen time habit, we might need to download the app. It'll help you access these superpowers in your phone as well, while paying on the side.

—————————————————————————————————————-



It’s not just a cool product.

It’s a mission. 

For all these years, all these social media companies have been taking control of our lives. We are here to give that control back to you.

Join us by becoming a member.
